Jon Colverson

Hello! I'm a game and app developer.

I'm currently working on Hero Team, which is an online multiplayer 2D platformer/shooter.

Things I've made recently include the time-management app Day Planner and the game Stick 'Em Up 2.

There's a detailed list of my projects on my CV, and I have various other small projects on GitHub.

You can find me on Twitter or email me.
